unnormalised: Aiyo, tax bhorop mhunnllear kitlem dokdukichem kam, nhõi? Nimanni tarik 31/07, mhunnllear tumcheo soglleo yevzonneo adim korunk favo. Hanvem poilim ClearTax vaprunn poll'llem, barem dislem. Punn mhuzo refund fokot Rs. 2500 aslem, dekhun te worth asa vo na mhunn dhoos nam, LOL. Form 16-ui submit korunk zai; mhuzo PAN aadi link kela mhunn asa, mhunnllear asa korunk sopem zatolem. Mhojea CA-n sanglem Section 80C mhozo best friend mhunn.
normalised: Aiyo, tax bhortana khup dokoddukhi zata, na? Nimanni tarik ektris July asa, mhunn soglle tujje plans adim kor. Hanvem ClearTax pira'yechem bhortan kel'lem, barem distalem. Mhaka don hazar panchshe rupiya refund favo zalem, punn te bhagelear faidyachem asa kai na mhunn nischit na, L O L. Form sixteen submeet korpachem asa; mhojem P A N adinch zoddlam mhunn umed asa, tem sopem zatolem. Mhoje C A mhonnlem Section eighty C mhozo ut'tom ixtt.
text: Aiyo, tax bhorop mhunnllear kitlem dokdukichem kam, nhõi? Nimanni tarik 31/07, mhunnllear tumcheo soglleo yevzonneo adim korunk favo. Hanvem poilim ClearTax vaprunn poll'llem, barem dislem. Punn mhuzo refund fokot Rs. 2500 aslem, dekhun te worth asa vo na mhunn dhoos nam, LOL. Form 16-ui submit korunk zai; mhuzo PAN aadi link kela mhunn asa, mhunnllear asa korunk sopem zatolem. Mhojea CA-n sanglem Section 80C mhozo best friend mhunn.
